nodes.html:
Discovery. Design. Implement. Support.

At Appvity, we value speed, clarity, and simplicity. We pride ourselves on listening to clients, gathering their requirements, and design a solution that removes the technical complexity to focus on the simplest way to solve an existing business problem.
Request Demo

Collaboration Portal & Automated Process Application

Bases on Microsoft 365 platform and services, we help customer to build the online application to serve the connection hub to connect everyone in your company, help company to automate, standardize the business processes to save time and improve the performances.

Microsoft Teams Platform Apps

We design and develop the app to use on the Microsoft Teams collaboration hub. Apps help people express themselves and work better together. We provide the development on the Teams Personal apps, Teams Tabs, Bots, Extensions and Connectors… that fully integrated to your Microsoft Teams environment.

Microsoft Azure cloud services application

In the trend of cloud platform, we build and manage powerful applications using Microsoft Azure cloud services include Azure App services, Azure Logic App, Azure Functions… We customize the solution to meet your business’ needs on Microsoft Azure platform

Mobile Application

Our team provide end-to-end Mobile App Design and Development Services for iOS, Android and Cross-platform solutions in Flutter, React Native. The app development supports native app and cross platform app development. Our mobile app solution not only the standalone app also the integration app from website-to-app for your enterprise
Break down and transform your business requirement into technical documents for further investigation.
Simplify technical documents in form of wireframe and architecture models to ensure the system will solve your enterprise’s demand in every aspect.
Build the system by code strictly to stick with the design and follow the business requirement.
Preparing test plan, test case and start to test the system to ensure it follows the business requirements.
Develop environment > [UAT] Staging environment > Production environment deployment. Follow this process tightly and control source clean and secured.
Live training/demo will be held when it is ready to use. Support via email, phone, or ticket is available.

Sharepoint

Deploy and support Microsoft SharePoint Products and Technologies in your organization and deliver highly scalable collaboration solutions. Our solutions are built on SharePoint Framework, PnP, Microsoft Graph, SharePoint Add-ins… We support both SharePoint version includes SharePoint on-premises and SharePoint in Microsoft 365.

Azure App Services

Build powerful application using Microsoft Azure platform. Azure's Platform as a Service (PaaS) offerings provide the fully managed services needed to power your apps include VM, App Services, Functions… Azure offers the reliability that's needed for high-availability applications, even including failover between different regions.

MEAN Stack

MEAN, a free, open-source, full-stack solution for MEAN applications. MEAN combines MongoDB, Express.js, AngularJS, and Node.js into a single, full stack solution for JavaScript development.

.NET Core

.NET Framework is a development platform developed by Microsoft for building apps for web, Windows, Windows Phone, Windows Server, and Microsoft Azure.

Power Automate

Power Platform is comprised of four key products: Power Apps, Power Automate, Power BI and Power Virtual Agents. Power Platform enables your business to craft solutions while empowering you to unite customized technology to help everyone, from the CEO to the front-line workers, drive the business with data.

Nintex Workflow

The World leader automate process platform. Nintex integrates with the world’s largest ecosystems including Microsoft SharePoint, Office 365, K2… Nintex makes it fast and easy to manage, automate, and optimize your business processes. We are the certified partner of Nintex solution provider.

Collaboration Portal

This project was built for the world’s largest consulting firm specializing in software security. The company just started to use SharePoint for intranet collaboration and document management. Appvity successfully deploy a SharePoint 2013 environment and was responsible for:
  • Architect, design and implement portal site structure, security structure, and overall information architecture. Including many new services introduced in SharePoint 2013.
  • Design the dataflow architecture, classification, indexing, and search engine
  • Developed a custom PKI dashboard to manage projects and portfolio. Wrote and deploy approval workflows for content review/approval.
  • Wrote documentation and training for project managers and IT department.

Health and Safety Management

We work with a partner specialize in technology consulting partner to provide a SharePoint based safety and hazard management system for a government client in Singapore. This project including custom applications development, custom web parts and workflow implementation, allow the client to:
  • Review and submit safety hazards and assessments using SharePoint. The business process can be accomplished though manual data entry via electronic forms, or automated using workflow.
  • Integration with SMS notification using custom activities in workflow.

Process Automation

We worked with a major international insurance company in Vietnam to automate critical business processes using Nintex Workflow and electronic forms:
  • Implement complete life cycle from procurement to payment business process, including:
    • Purchase request and approval
    • Proposal review and selection
    • Vendor review and approval
    • Payment requests and approval
  • Integration with Financial system to read and update data from the workflow.
  • Implement reports, dashboard, and charts for management review.

Document Management

We worked with a global Petro and Gas company in Vietnam to implement SharePoint portal to address the following issues:
  • Architecture, design and deploy the entire SharePoint farm. Including intranet, extranet, and backup disaster recovery farms.
  • Implement workflows to support daily business process.
  • Develop secured extranet portal site to allow customer to collaborate with its partners and contractors worldwide.
  • Develop the Intranet portal employ a document center to manage large volume of electronic documents for exploration projects, with 3TB of files being migrated from file shares into SharePoint.
  • Setup the Managed Metadata system to help users to manage, navigate, search the content easily

Task Tracking and Management

We worked with a global manufacturing company in US to implement SharePoint project management portal with the following capabilities:
  • Develop electronic forms using InfoPath and SharePoint workflow to allow the customer to implement a project approval system.
  • KPIs, Dashboard for project management
  • On-demand integration with Excel for data analysis.

Online Approval and Digital Signature

Coming Soon...

Migration Service to Microsoft 365

We provide system integration and implementation service for major Airline in Vietnam to migrate their existing business to Microsoft’s Office 365 cloud platform.
  • Migration of data and documents to SharePoint online.
  • Migration of emails and user security groups. Design and deploy Active Directory federation.
  • Prepare and create Office 365 portal, sites, user groups, and list information structure.
  • Create custom apps to provide enhance Corporate News Feed, Tasks Tracking, Corporate and Group Calendar, and Resource Tracking.
  • Implement custom branding for the entire site.
